com.android.server

Class DeviceStorageMonitorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.Binder
      • com.android.server.DeviceStorageMonitorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.IBinder

    public class DeviceStorageMonitorService
extends android.os.Binder
    This class implements a service to monitor the amount of disk storage space on the device. If the free storage on device is less than a tunable threshold value (a secure settings parameter; default 10%) a low memory notification is displayed to alert the user. If the user clicks on the low memory notification the Application Manager application gets launched to let the user free storage space. Event log events: A low memory event with the free storage on device in bytes is logged to the event log when the device goes low on storage space. The amount of free storage on the device is periodically logged to the event log. The log interval is a secure settings parameter with a default value of 12 hours. When the free storage differential goes below a threshold (again a secure settings parameter with a default value of 2MB), the free memory is logged to the event log.
